name: Pumphouse Simulator
description:
The game where you work as an Pumphouse engineer, which you have to maintain machines and pump water  to the town!

21/10/17: 

Updated the game to enable more resolution sizes. (Might add quick smartphone compatibility soon!)

Fixed spellings and grammars within the game texts.

Worked around a bug where clicking on different machine while text bow is on caused minor gameplay problems.

Added background music and sfx.

Now values are only presented in whole numbers.
